hasMenuItem.description: Peking Duck presented in two courses. First, enjoy crispy duck skin paired with delicate crepes. Choose your second course: either duck meat lettuce wrap, duck with pineapple and ginger, or duck sautéed with Chinese broccoli.

hasMenuItem.description: Three-course Peking duck experience. 1st: crispy skin with crepes. Options for 2nd: meat in lettuce wrap, with pineapple & ginger, or Chinese broccoli. 3rd: duck with veggie & tofu soup.

review.reviewBody: Dinner for one is enough for my hubby and I to share I put the leftovers in fridge for him very good portions and alwaysdekicious  food
The food is not good. It was overcooked and lacked flavour. I called the restaurant but they didn't speak English..
Food is always Good. This time only, i ordered House special chow mein but got house special fried rice.
everything was great! will definitely order again. i didn't realize that i am a little farther away from the restaurant but everything was still hot upon arrival :)
It is delicious, and Dasher is a fast hand. Good Cuisine and Nice Service.
